column3: “Thank you, Jesus OG!   Mind blowing strain.  Took one session with the Arizer Solo, to put me on a fascinating level of consciousness.  Never felt anything quite like it.  You can feel it on your face.  Honestly, it felt psychedelic, provoking the most interesting thoughts.  It's the kind of strain that motivates you to watch or listen to something intellectually interesting. Your face feels weird, in a good way and ...”
“Great social" strain.

column1: I suffer from mild social anxiety
column2: which some strains of marijuana can exacerbate. Jesus OG has the opposite effect.

column3: makes me feel euphoric even. But unlike most sativas
column4: this one makes me talkative and social rather than that energy and euphoria just staying in my head

column3: “So good it'll make you Catholic.”

“This is a strain brought to us by the talented and creative folks at TGA Subcool seeds. They have a pretty impressive resume of strains they've introduced to the cannabis community like Space Queen, Jack the Ripper and Querkle just to name a few. And this one might be their best. I had read about this strain on the TGA website and found it most alluring. I was browsing the menu at Spectrum caregivers and much to my p...”
“Makes you feel like an enlightened God amoung Mortals!  Very tranquil high.  Calm but alert.”

“I have never seen so much lucid dreams in my whole entire life. This is the holy grail to connect with yourself and to use in meditative practices as well as lucid dreams. I strongly recommend it to cure depression and anxiety. Really powerful stuff, no wonder they call it Jesus!”
“Holy shit this got me so lifted. Like Jesus Christ this strain gives a great head high. Good god pick this up if you can. But dear lord do not forget about the boat times.”

“Had this strain after a lengthy, ah, legally enforced tolerance break. And it was very well suited to the chaos that was surrounding me at the time I was smoking a lot of this. Smell was piney and intense. Look was very bright, yellowish-green, absolutely loaded with trichomes, and sticky as all hell, befitting of this strains devilish, zinger of a high. Very trippy and VERY stimulating. Easy to overdo it and end up ...”

“I tested this med for the first time today 4-13-2015.  I picked it up from the good folks at Rare Stone in San Clemente CA.  I used a tower whip vaporizer and a simba 4 pc grinder.  My standard scoop is about 1/5 to 1/4 gram.  i was able to get 4 full pulls from this flower.  When ground the scent was very similar to Chernobly (Golden Ticket) cut.  There was a hint of lemon pledge as well.  The trim was not as nice a...”

“I suffer from MS, AutoImmune Neuropathy, muscle spasms, depression, cycle cell anemia, and another dozen autoimmune issues and a half dozen congenital malformations.  I was able to give up all opioids more than a year ago with the help of high THC edibles, but I needed something to calm the spasms and ease the moderate pain during the day: Something that would leave me capable of reading and learning and conversing w...”

“i bought 1.5g of this strain just to sample it because i'm trying lots of things as a new cannabis patient, and man oh man, this one is fire. my fiancee, a patient for chronic pain, would actually benefit much more than i would from this! the BEST pain relief from any strain of cannabis i've ever seen, hands-down.”

“I had smoked this red haired sativa years ago and was delighted to see it available at The Green Room.  This uppy strain will fill you with peace and oneness with the bros at The Green Room  Nice spiritual high along with the added bonus of taking your mind off of serious pain.  Tastes smooth with no throat burn.  

I also learned that you can flip the tops of the medicine containers over to make an air tight contain...”

“this train is literally a punch to the brain. I felt slightly mentally disabled and I'm pretty sure that everyone thought I was stupid. I ended up going for an amazing two-hour walk and just a loving being super high. all I could think of was the white guy from Half Baked and how I seemed just like him”

“I am a Indica person normally, however I tried Jesus OG and it is amazing.  I feel the most amazing high for a very nice length of time.  It also is an extremely happy strain.  I use this when I am ready to relax and laugh.  It will take you over the edge of happy and it feels very good!!”

“Overall, I'd give it an 8 rating.  I really like this strain, but wouldn't go as far as calling it Jesus or the Savior as some do.  It doesn't have a certain flavor that jumps out at you, but it's smooth & tastes good.  Nice mind/body balance I expect from a hybrid.  Being an indica dominant hybrid, it's definitely potent.  It lasts a long time off of only a couple hits, which is great & leaves open the option for in...”
“Jesus OG is absolute heaven. 5 stars all day long!!! Super great daytime smoke, functional, with a tingly body high. This is perfection. It will leave you saying: Hallelujah! Praise Jesus!" 😉”"
“Deep, soft high. Relaxation and warmth. Body tension release. Euphoric, yet focused awareness.”
“Gives you that sleeping while awake feeling and a fun seeking attitude”

“Great strain! I've seen it around a bunch of the shops lately and the other day a friend came over and brought some. Now, I've been told there are a couple of different phenotypes of this strain, one on the kushy side and at least one that leans much more heavily on the citrus side. The one I tried was very terpy it had a very sweet citrus flavor on exhale, more orange peel than lemon, there is a light woody, kush fl...”
“this is the holy water of marijuana”
“Jesus OG is absolute heaven. 5 stars all day long!!! Super great daytime smoke, functional, with a tingly body high. This is perfection. It will leave you saying: Hallelujah! Praise Jesus!" 😉”"

“Oh my goodness!...so happy when I finally got my hands on this! A cross of Hells Angels OG X jACK THE RIPPER!...You can see the jack side of this strain in it's spherical long bud structure and beautiful orange calyx developement and it has a very lovely citrus/grapefruit aroma. The taste is more on the earthy og side of the scale and we LLLLove it! Very strong hitter and long lasting. Top shelf and if you see it, gr...”
“GREAT HIGH DID THE JOB FOR MY SHOULDER PAIN AND THE TASTE WAS FLAVORFULL GREAT FOR BEDTIME TOO.”

“Godly shit 👍👍
Something everyone has to try”
“This is one of the most delicious smelling buds i've ever found. Its so sweet and smooth and gives you a great body buzz. Also helps a lot with back pain and muscle tension. Its wonderful.”

“WOW ..... The euphoria is immaculate yet the ability to still stay focused and be productive is outstanding. I mean where's a 6th star when you need that above and beyond factor??! Anyway I'm going to enjoy the rest of my high! :) 👍🏼”

“I very much enjoyed this strain! I have a slight anxiety problem and this strain definitely helped curb that and it also kept me busy at work, very focused. It was super, whether u wanna dance or sleep or anything in between.”
“GREAT HIGH DID THE JOB FOR MY SHOULDER PAIN AND THE TASTE WAS FLAVORFULL GREAT FOR BEDTIME TOO.”

“Personally, this is by far my favorite strain I've came across. It has an excellent aroma and the high is a great experience with the increased laughter and revolutionary ideas it brings to mind. Highly recommended tracking down this legendary stain!”

“I was so impressed with beautify buds big hairs coated in ice droplets of tri's. Super dank super smelly phenomenal trees. Absolutely phenomenal. Possibly the strongest I've ever used out of my volcano.”

“It's definitely the uplifting and focused experience I prefer with a Sativa. Tad spicy lemony scent with a zesty pine with that OG dank heavy smell (my wife yelled woo from across the room). Definitely heady between the eyes but not zoned out but more reflective and aware of surroundings. Music is an immersive experience. Pain is lessened more of a dullness. Does cause you to trail off a bit so not perhaps for work m...”

“Brand: Moxie
THC: 92.36%
Form: live resin

No matter how many times I let Jesus (OG) into my life, I'm never disappointed. Hilarious I find this was originally labeled a sativa, now an indica. It can perform as either, depending what I need it for.
Amazing for pain relief, amazing for nausea, and effects are stoney and last a few hours.
I try not to rate strains as 5 stars unless I genuinely mean it. Sure enough, I m...”

“Although it's parent plants seem like they would be an unholy alliance (Hell fire OG + Jack the ripper) This bud is straight from heaven ! So uplifting, like a warm blanket of positive energy. The flavor was great, fruity and slightly citrus. The buzz is very focused and happy, with a wonderful energetic kick. Great for fatigue and my inflammation problems, and of course depression. Hard to be in the dumps, when my h...”

“It's definitely the uplifting and focused experience I prefer with a Sativa. Tad spicy lemony scent with a zesty pine with that OG dank heavy smell (my wife yelled woo from across the room). Definitely heady between the eyes but not zoned out but more reflective and aware of surroundings. Music is an immersive experience. Pain is lessened more of a dullness. Does cause you to trail off a bit so not perhaps for work m...”
“Did not take many hits to get me good 'n stoned. Very good strain. If you can get it, get a good amount of it.”

“One of my favorite daytime strains. Very straight-forward blissful sativa. Nothing special about the taste or aroma, but damn this strain gets the job done. Add new meaning to the phrase y'all need Jesus."”"

“Shit I feel like Raiden off of Mortal Kombat right now. This is definitely one of the best strains I have tried. It makes you feel euphoric and unlike most strains I am able to hold a conversation with people”

“Thank you Jesus lml ... This Jesus Og was 🔥🔥🔥🔥 I didn't think it's was gonna be that good the taste is amazing it smells amazing and it hit like Tyson in 88 good bud Jesus Og is here for us all I'm high rambling fuck it lmfaoooo thank you Jesus I knew you was a OG lml”
“pretty potent great for wanting to stay focused”
“Great sleep aid”
“Gets you so high you'll say Jesus

“One of my favorite daytime strains. Very straight-forward blissful sativa. Nothing special about the taste or aroma, but damn this strain gets the job done. Add new meaning to the phrase y'all need Jesus."”"

.
.
I feel euphoria almost immediately as I also feel small and a burst of mental energy in a clear mind that is slowly getting mood elevation as wel...”

I try not to rate strains as 5 stars unless I genuinely mean it. Sure enough, I m...”

“Shit I feel like Raiden off of Mortal Kombat right now. This is definitely one of the best strains I have tried. It makes you feel euphoric and unlike most strains I am able to hold a conversation with people”
“Pretty good!! It was a bit harsh. overall high was nice! felt uplifting and felt like I could still remain a functioning member of society.”
“Yes Lord! This strain is definitely one of my top 5. Jesus OG made me prefect. It took over my body, I rode waves of ecstasy and made love to beasts.”
“Great wake and bake to start the day with a focused yet mellow mood. I did get the munchies as a side effect more so than usual.”

“Jesus OG: One of my Favorites 10/10. Has this strong smell of Citrus Lemon like Pine-Sol I've ever smelt. Crumble it up and it's even STRONGER. Even smoking it on the Lips has a very Smooth Sweet Lemony Pine taste to it. Sativa Feels so STRONG. Gives good insight and views possibly Motivation. Makes me feel like Goku in Super Saiyan Form Powering Up is the best way to Describe this feeling.”

“Dense buds, but break up easily. Quite crystally when observed under the magnifier light. The Jack the Ripper side is definitely present, but muted, in terms of aroma. Very smooth hitter. High announces itself in the head predominantly - not long after two hits, a very peaceful perspective is coming over me. Very nice, Personally, THIS is the Jesus I prefer on a Sunday morning - Jesus OG. Perfect strain to prepare th...”
“It's strong, tasty, and uplifting/energizing. I call this my golf wax, it's perfect for any day time activity with friends.”
“This is a great strain for relaxing and socializing. I have no anxiety and feel very focused.”

“Pretty potent!  Watch your intake... can feel the power come up on you.  I think this leans more towards a Sativa and have seen others say so as well.  This one left me feeling dumb, lazy but anxious, and spacy.  Just not for me...  Good flavor and burn.”

“The Strain has a wonderful Earth/fruit flavor that leads you down the hall towards a deep relaxing stone where your mind is still free to wander...

Loving it.”
“It's strong, tasty, and uplifting/energizing. I call this my golf wax, it's perfect for any day time activity with friends.”

“The Strain has a wonderful Earth/fruit flavor that leads you down the hall towards a deep relaxing stone where your mind is still free to wander...

Loving it.”

“One of the best mind-blowing strains out there. This Bar Mitzvah boy approves. Uplifting, creative, and a genuinely happy high. Good one to listen to music to (especially the Doobie Brothers, lol, get it?) or to get down with any kind of art form. Puts your faith back in humanity, as well as adding a whole new twist on #WWJD!”

“Dense buds, but break up easily. Quite crystally when observed under the magnifier light. The Jack the Ripper side is definitely present, but muted, in terms of aroma. Very smooth hitter. “I WENT IN NOT KNOWING EXACTLY WHAT I WANTED AFTER CHECKING WEEDMAPS, BUT I KNEW I DEFINITELY WANTED AN INDICA. AS SOON AS I SMELLED THE JESUS OG(BESIDES HOW BOMB IT LOOKS ALSO) I IMMEDIATELY KNEW I WAS TAKING THAT ONE. I CANT BELIEVE ITS NOT APART OF THE EXCLUSIVE!”

“I'm vaping Select Strains Elite Jesus OG tonite, because I waked and baked with Platinum Kush earlier today, which forced me to take a nap and wake and bake again :)  but this time obviously with a sativa because hey, it's Saturday and I need to enjoy it and not sleep it all away.  I made myself a cup of Trader Joe's Columbia & Sumatra House Blend and between the two could feel myself becoming more awake.

Jesus OG s...”

“If you like the energetic, producitive effects of Moby Dick or Green Crack, than say hello to Jesus!!!  This is the most productive pot I've ever smoked. I had just finished a long, tedious day of reorganizing my home office. And then hit the pool for 40 minutes of vigorous swimming. Afterwards while cooking dinner I lite my first Jesus OG! I continued to organize my office late into the evening. Thank you Jesus!”
“been smoking Jesus OG wax for about a couple weeks now on the daily and its still just as good as it was when i started lemony and long lasting”

The Jesus OG will energize you because it is Sativa-Dominant and helps with focus with a side of wild euphoria that if you can control will enable you to do way better in the gym but some people don't get it and space out. I don't space out, next to Pink Buddha (everyth...”

“So glad I found Jesus OG one of my faves. I also Love JESUS (Hybrid) wish they could get together with the Grow Gods skills to create the new future Hybrid combo of these: JESUS OG+JESUS (HYBRID)=
BIGGR THAN JESUS" or "2nd Coming of JESUS" I hope someone with genetic skills can create this new hybrid soon if not already done.”"

“Took 4 hits and im already blown off this stuff. Smells and taste like a og strain thats for sure.

This stuff is great lou”
“I feel like walking on water !!! Thanks Jesus!!”
“my new favorite”

“One of, if not, THE best strain I've tried to date. Tried at least 50 strains as of being a moderate smoker 3-4 years ago. The strain sounds and feels like exactly what the name implies. You'll be uplifted and feel like you're walking on cloud 900. Very euphoric, and one of the most psychedlic strains I've tried. Best for stress and depression, and does great with pain and hunger issues too. If you're huge on sativas...”
“been smoking Jesus OG wax for about a couple weeks now on the daily and its still just as good as it was when i started lemony and long lasting”

“Very nice flavor with a nice uplifting high. Always a great one  to enjoy when you want to smoke something a little more relaxing than a straight Sativa. Although I'm always up to try a new strain, I always like to have the dependable strains on hand too, and I always consider Jesus OG to be one of my dependable strains to get me happily stoned.”
“i like this it  taste good”

“great high. I used some wax in a dabber and the high is almost instant. other than coughing for 10 minutes, it was uplifting, the best way to describe the high is giggly and goofy. it lowers your eyes and use eye drops.”
“my new favorite”

“Well where to start I have been growing all of my life and ice been working on my two strains for the last 5 solid yrs I am a landrace connasuer and untill now a straight up particular self righteous asshole who just never strayed far out from three landrace crosses. Huh very limited mind frame and hypocrite seeing as how my favorite strain hands down has been monkey paw for as long as I can remember knowing of it. l...”
“sativa dominant hybrid dank danks!!!! I'm sooo stuck, looooove it!!!!”

“great high. I used some wax in a dabber and the high is almost instant. other than coughing for 10 minutes, it was uplifting, the best way to describe the high is giggly and goofy. it lowers your eyes and use eye drops.”

“Absolutely amazing strain!! Wonderful strong smell and was slightly fluffy (which I prefer) but the buds were insanely frosty!!! 1 bowl of this and it'll make you feel so uplifted and happy and will also make you eat a lot. It wasn't too great for sleep but for daytime use it makes wonderful medicine. Great for people with anxiety!”

“A vibrant mix of lemon pledge and a fresh pair of Jordan's. 
Like zesty new rubber soles delivering a relaxing head high that leaves you feeling clean. 
The good lord truly blessed us with this splendid blend.”
“Jesus OG is Top, Top-shelf. Uplifting, clarity, creativity, motivating, fruity and fresh. #1”
“Gives me a headache”

“this was definitely a let’s get stuff done today strain really I was expecting a couch lock when I bought this but after taking a nice huge dab at home I found myself accomplishing things I’ve been putting off for weeks cleaning the bathroom organizing my closet etc. definitely recommend this strain to anyone looking to get some things done while staying medicated”
“Head punch with a nice body stone.”
“Premium strain. This has more THC the a lot of strains you'll find, YET, it's the most clear headed feeling you'll ever have. The effects are potent and calm mannered.”

“Jesus Og was a fun high, gave me energy after a long day at work. put me in a great, giggly mood, you can feel this high on your face and once that wears off you end up relaxed and get a good nights rest w/ vivid dreams. wild.”
“One of the best strains I have ever tried!”

“Jesus take the wheel! Wasnt even 5 minutes after smoking this that I became one with the couch! I had so much pain in my face and legs and after 5 mins I don’t even think I can feel my body anymore. This was crazy strong and better yet, it didn’t trigger ANY panic attack in me! Yahoo...time for a snack and bed for me!”
“This shit hella bomb”

“It's was good.
I mean it wasn't mind blowing but it was a good lift. I think the name over hypes it. Other then that I loved the flavor. Good strain.”
“i love sativas and this is a very potent strain it lasts and  gave me an all-around calm feeling.”

“This strain is no joke. Very powerful, strong smoke. One small 'knife hit' hits hard. This lasts a long time and helps with stress and restlessness for me. Super stoned yet focused and keeps me motivated. Great strain 👍”
“This shit hella bomb”

“It's was good.
I mean it wasn't mind blowing but it was a good lift. I think the name over hypes it. Other then that I loved the flavor. Good strain.”

“I've had two phenos of this strain. One was nothing special, the other was a perfect example of what sour kush should be. Lemony, earthy, fuely, foxtailed buds that stink up whatever room they inhabit. Five star medicine without a doubt!”

“I got this from Michigan. This strain makes you feel very happy and Euphoric. If you don't want to get sleepy, use this. You will feel tingly after a hit or few and it simply feels great. It smells great, and looks great too.”
“i love sativas and this is a very potent strain it lasts and  gave me an all-around calm feeling.”
“taste wasn’t that smooth”

“Smooth. All around smooth and powerful. No strong cough, nice nose bite, not overly smelly, but good OG pine and lemon earth scent. Tastes spicy and OG piney. So powerful. It’s marked as a Sativa but it actually hits me hard like a good Indica without sleepy couch lock. But your head gets heavy. The visuals are good and a real concentration boost for my ADHD.

Overall it’s a great Sativa for me because they usually d...”

“I got this from Michigan. This strain makes you feel very happy and Euphoric. If you don't want to get sleepy, use this. You will feel tingly after a hit or few and it simply feels great. It smells great, and looks great too.”

I swear to gawd dawg. Jesus...

column5: was there the tree of life
column6: which bare twelve manner of fruits
column7: and yielded her fruit every month: and the leaves of the tree were for the healing of the nations." Rev 22:2”"

column3: “Probably one of the best strains I've smoked in concentrate form. mine was just called Jesus though. very good head high. very strong. I loved the tasted, very floral on exhale and also tasted really clean.”

“Best strain I've ever tried across all indicas, hybrids, and sativas. It goes quickly in my area, so I stock up when it's in stock. I use the harmony farms cartridge and am consistently satisfied. I suffer from major depression, agoraphobia, PTSD, etc. (I could go on but I will not) and this helps me get relief and remember what it's like to smile and laugh genuinely. Makes me feel normal. Might just be me, but this ...”
“Exactly picture perfect of a sticky bud.”
“Harsh. Fairly hard to smoke. Good high, energetic”

“Probably one of the best strains I've smoked in concentrate form. mine was just called Jesus though. very good head high. very strong. I loved the tasted, very floral on exhale and also tasted really clean.”

“A vibrant mix of lemon pledge and a fresh pair of Jordan's. 
Like zesty new rubber soles delivering a relaxing head high that leaves you feeling clean. 
The good lord truly blessed us with this splendid blend.”
“The best I ever had.”
“Jesus it was good LOL get it get it it's a joke Jesus it was good but it really was good so five stars”

“Yupp. Just moved to Thorton,Colorado. This was the 1st strain I bought. Thought it was weak at first but ooooohhh nooo. This high is very long and it creeps up on you. Will also have you feeling mellow like jello. Jesus OG ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ {Daloy}”
“Shared this strain with a couple of friends and I thought it was alright. Got me very talkative and feeling quite relaxed.”
“I love the way this stimulates my mind. It’s great to end a hard days work plus , a real brain teaser.”

“This is a really good sativa, it almost feels like a psychedelic.

I vaped mine in the volcano and the first thirty minutes was waves of positive energy, some anxiety (where the “like a psychedelic” comes from) but the anxiety for me turned into a large burst of energy. 

The effects seem to leave after about an hour, but still leaving you lifted and in a good mood.


I think I found my new favorite day time strain.”
“I'm not a religious man but if I were, I'd compare this to if you ground up Jesus and put him in some marijuana. Holy hell, was I wasted.”
“I've been getting the strain for $5 gram and at that price it's bomb AZ”
“Definitely a new favorite of mine. Great flavor  and high.”
“the Lord hath cometh in this strain”
“the Lord hath cometh in this strain”

“Mellow at first. Good sativa, head high. I didn't really care for this taste. Even as an oil it was rather earthy.
But the high settled in well and my wife especially liked this strain.  She found a good amount of euphoria where I personally just felt rather happy and enjoyed being active overall.”
“Pretty good high.  Super sweet finish to me. Would buy again”
“Really strong spacy sativa high, but also relaxes the body”
“Great Smoke! Definitely a higher grade strain”

“Smoking in Seattle, bud at nearly 37%. Small buds with a complex aroma but almost no flavor when smoked or vaped

Super relaxing, gentle onset, into powerful head high. Reminds me of some great kushy indicas I like very much, with a lot more energy.

like a great kush though my mouth is dry and my eyes are red, and its a little too strong to be considered a productive" smoke for me. Great for a long walk
“If you feel like dancing to music while in your room home alone, along with letting the sunlight shine through you like a hyper beam from a Venusaur, this is the strain for you.”
“A very nice daytime strain, for when you have errands to run and need a quick pick-me-up with focus!”
“Freaking fire, I would pick this up again. Smelt lemony, high lasted a good while. Felt super happy and aware.”

“Wowza, this strain is amazing! Very uplifted yet focused high. You can definitely feel this in the face, mostly the lips. Almost feels like an indica in the body. Maybe Jesus was the son of God....  Hrmmmm.”
“Excellent upbeat inspiring high. A bit more intense than Alpha Cow, not as smooth coming on.”
“Oh my Jesus what a OG you Are!!!!”

“This strain starts with a very earthy taste and finishes with a smooth spicy/citrus flavor. The effects are a nice mixture of a heady high that is a bit spacey and a very relaxing body sensation that isn't too dopey. An interesting mix that is a nice experience.”
“this is a really strong sativa, gives me a huge head high.  top 5 sativa imo.”
“If your a heavy blazer if you get a good batch you will enjoy it has to be grown well to be a strong smoke.”
“Smooth. tastes great. one of my favorite strains for relaxing and free thinking”
“Awesome sativa!”

“Had the opportunity to partake in some testing of True North Extract's  Jesus OG Dripper of C02 extracted honey oil & it's Extraordinarily Excellent IMO! Easy filled tank & vape-take-u-away! Seems as though the Terpenes are blessed, & taste is true life, & her effects are quite impressive, sticking true to a Sativa dominant sexy Maiden's forum. Coming in at 70.01% THC &  0.74% CBD, TNE's (True North Extracts) Jesus O...”
“It's definitely an 85 15 sativa dominate hybrid it has a strong pungent citrus pine smell a fuzzy massage feeling glides in a relaxing rush through the sides of your head”
“the bomb”
“Got me high as a kite - definitely has a comedown effect, but who cares. Just smoke more and do it all over again.”

“wow!! Talk about incredible! A truly unforgettable flavor and smell. Energetic and euphoric high. At one point I was freaking out that I couldn't feel my lungs, and the next I'm mopping the floors to do yoga. Love this strain when you just need to lose half a day doing everything but nothing.”
“One of my all time favorites. First thing after waking up. It's better than coffee. Gets your mind focused. Gets your body wanting to move.”

“Put on Marilyn Manson's version of Personal Jesus" and let the power of this strain compel you. This Sativa gave me a great head and body high. Jesus OG is perfect when you need to receive the stress of a long day but remain productive at the same time.”"
“This Strain Is Ok Not Strong At All”

“Goes right into your brain-piece and zips around, leaving a trail of shimmering gold in its wake.  Spreads across your face and then hums for awhile, little leprechauns lifting your mood up into the sky and then exploding into confetti.  

Was that too vague?”
“great”
“I don't alway like sativas, but this strain is really excellant. Great for migraines  and PTSD.”
“Amazing! ✌🏼️”
“Hells OG X Jacks Cleaner X Space Queen”
“Helped tremendously with my chrons pain.”
“very cerebral high. very very good”
“Love this stuff, one of my go-to strains.”
“Amazing! Keeps me nice and relaxed but my mind is clear. Totally able to smoke a bong and then work all night! Love this strain”

“very nice high. very calm and mellow, far from a sharp high you get from strains like Ice Queen and northern lights. one issue I had though, I found it hard to keep my fridge full. like I have had munchies before, I have eaten a loaf of bread in a night more than a few times. but this shit made me wondering if I could cook up some goldfish, I DON'T GAVE FUCKING GOLDFISH. I started making apple pie big enough to feed ...”
“#kingseaweed gets 5 stars! yup, didn't believe my budtender when he mentioned it. AUDACIOUS i thought. so, of course, gimme see it! in a word Lovely."  highly recommended for creative types
column4: intellectuals and visionaries. what would the imagination molecule be called in the flower? it's in nere.”"

column3: “great strong head high”

“I can verify that when grown outdoors Jesus OG produces large amounts of high quality flowers per plant. Does indeed grow tall if not topped. A plant cloned in early July was 7' tall when harvested in early October. Very sticky.”

“After the lemon fresh aftertaste leaves your taste buds, you're next accompanied by a euphoric mellowness and an overall sense of well being.
Physically - A pulsating and and tingly body buzz provides needed pain relief, without the unwanted slightly stoopid.
It's a good lunch break bud, that won't give ya away as the stoner at work.
Feeling this great without smoking away my ambition/motivation reveals the motive be...”
“very nice tight buds would buy this again”
“Perfect for after work!”
“Have to give this strain a five. Good for everything! Great taste and a great high! Jesus OG left me floating for hours.”
“Jesus saves, great for at work, probably great at church...probably.... I love it, makes me happily focused”

“Jesus is completely appropriate for a descriptor for this strain!! Very focused and motivating. This strain is very, very good for day time medding. It kills anxiety while giving you a lot of energy. This combination of effects makes this strain a very good medication for people with PTSD, anxiety, or depression. Very recommended!!”
“One of the best. Makes sense why do it's named after the Lord himself. Very good daytime smoke not too stoney. Solid. 10/10”

“This strain is sativa dominant 80-20 ration according to other sites on Google 
Please check it out”
“Powerful strain. Immediate energy. Taste earthly and citrus.”

“Jesus Og was a fun high, gave me energy after a long day at work. put me in a great, giggly mood, you can feel this high on your face and once that wears off you end up relaxed and get a good nights rest w/ vivid dreams. wild.”

“I believe I must have picked up a batch that has different parent strains, as the Jesus I got is definitely a sativa dominant strain. 
It is a light smoke with what I'd say is a fresh cut grass taste. It left me happy, uplifted and never drowsy. I'd use this during the day.”
“amazing if you're dealing with depression or just want to have fun and be happy ☺”
“Shared this strain with a couple of friends and I thought it was alright. Got me very talkative and feeling quite relaxed.”

“Smooth. All around smooth and powerful. No strong cough, nice nose bite, not overly smelly, but good OG pine and lemon earth scent. Tastes spicy and OG piney. So powerful. It’s marked as a Sativa but it actually hits me hard like a good Indica without sleepy couch lock. But your head gets heavy. The visuals are good and a real concentration boost for my ADHD.

Overall it’s a great Sativa for me because they usually d...”
“Premium strain. This has more THC the a lot of strains you'll find, YET, it's the most clear headed feeling you'll ever have. The effects are potent and calm mannered.”

“Just smoked a J of this and I'm definitely wrapped in a cocoon of euphoria and relaxation.  No couch lock and I'm about an hour in.  It did make me a little anxious for a bit but I worked through it.  Keep that in mind if you are susceptible to that.  I'm curious what the high would be like vaping this.  Definitely going to grab an eighth next time I see it.”
“Nice Lemon smell and the high is a creeper I took 4-5 pulls and couldn’t finish the jay the wonderful feeling my mind went to is like lawd have mercy 🙌🏾🙌🏾🙌🏾🙌🏾🙌🏾”
“Pretty good high.  Super sweet finish to me. Would buy again”
“I've been getting the strain for $5 gram and at that price it's bomb AZ”
“awesome strand and beautiful buds! nice euphoric head high. Perfect for when you want to do something creative or be productive around the house. Keep this in your arsenal! In my top 5!”

“It's was good.
I mean it wasn't mind blowing but it was a good lift. I think the name over hypes it. Other then that I loved the flavor. Good strain.”

“this was definitely a let’s get stuff done today strain really I was expecting a couch lock when I bought this but after taking a nice huge dab at home I found myself accomplishing things I’ve been putting off for weeks cleaning the bathroom organizing my closet etc. definitely recommend this strain to anyone looking to get some things done while staying medicated”

“Confusing Info???...in that Leafly lists it as an Indica yet Dreamsteam Pure vapes of Harvest dispensaries have it as a Sativa cartridge. And other places on the internet (ie;marijuanabreak and medicaljane) describe Jesus OG as an 80% sativa dominant. Hello? Hmm?”

“Never smoked this strain before.. but after I did, it felt like I was walking on water with Jesus himself. On the real though, this is a pretty good strain for indica. Not a big fan of indica as much, but this strain was something different. My body felt way relaxed, I felt clear headed, felt hungry. I wouldn’t mind having this strain again. The smell is really earthy, fruity, and sweet. I recommend this special bud ...”
“Very motivational high.  I was heavily medicated after 2 bowls. Euphoric and more of a body high with head control. I would definitely buy this again.”

“Wow, if I didn't know better I'd have thought I tried a totally different strain than the other reviewers. The stuff I got from Pilot Farms in Washington gives me almost no head high. I kept taking more hits hoping it would but the body effects started making my knees weak and yet I still barely had a head high (I'm a lightweight who normally takes one or two vape hits, I was at four on this strain).

This would prob...”
“This was everything! The bud was green and purple. Which was different. Very Earthy smelling. I prayed and smoked it all away.”
“amazing indica”

“Smoking in Seattle, bud at nearly 37%. Small buds with a complex aroma but almost no flavor when smoked or vaped

Super relaxing, gentle onset, into powerful head high. Reminds me of some great kushy indicas I like very much, with a lot more energy.

like a great kush though my mouth is dry and my eyes are red, and its a little too strong to be considered a productive" smoke for me. Great for a long walk

“Mellow at first. Good sativa, head high. I didn't really care for this taste. Even as an oil it was rather earthy.
But the high settled in well and my wife especially liked this strain.  She found a good amount of euphoria where I personally just felt rather happy and enjoyed being active overall.”

“This is a really good sativa, it almost feels like a psychedelic.

I vaped mine in the volcano and the first thirty minutes was waves of positive energy, some anxiety (where the “like a psychedelic” comes from) but the anxiety for me turned into a large burst of energy. 

The effects seem to leave after about an hour, but still leaving you lifted and in a good mood.


I think I found my new favorite day time strain.”

“Yupp. Just moved to Thorton,Colorado. This was the 1st strain I bought. Thought it was weak at first but ooooohhh nooo. This high is very long and it creeps up on you. Will also have you feeling mellow like jello. Jesus OG ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ {Daloy}”

“Best strain I've ever tried across all indicas, hybrids, and sativas. It goes quickly in my area, so I stock up when it's in stock. I use the harmony farms cartridge and am consistently satisfied. I suffer from major depression, agoraphobia, PTSD, etc. (I could go on but I will not) and this helps me get relief and remember what it's like to smile and laugh genuinely. Makes me feel normal. Might just be me, but this ...”
“taste wasn’t that smooth”
“This shit hella bomb”

“Jesus take the wheel! Wasnt even 5 minutes after smoking this that I became one with the couch! I had so much pain in my face and legs and after 5 mins I don’t even think I can feel my body anymore. This was crazy strong and better yet, it didn’t trigger ANY panic attack in me! Yahoo...time for a snack and bed for me!”
“One of the best strains I have ever tried!”
“Head punch with a nice body stone.”
“Gives me a headache”
“Jesus OG is Top, Top-shelf. Uplifting, clarity, creativity, motivating, fruity and fresh. #1”

“A vibrant mix of lemon pledge and a fresh pair of Jordan's. 
Like zesty new rubber soles delivering a relaxing head high that leaves you feeling clean. 
The good lord truly blessed us with this splendid blend.”

“I just made a donation at a dispensary in Santa Cruz and was able to find some frosty and potent Jesus OG. First off, I have never felt a body high this intense before. It doesn't hit you immediately but when it does you will literally be saying 'Jesus Christ'. I feel super focused as well, and that's hard to find with a lot of strains for me. I suffer from PTSD and the body high is helping me more than strains I've ...”
“It's a very light and airy effect. Probably great for activities relying on focus. It's not so much invigorating as it is calming. Good for novice smokers.”

“it is available at Rivers Edge in Grayling Michigan.
I prefer Blue Dream, but all I could get that is close, is Jesus OG”

“excellent strain never heard of it before rill the pot shop had it on special 23$ per 3.5 g went home had some went back a few hours later picked up an oz I like the mild relaxing high that doesn't make you feel stupid.”
“awsome”

“For me, personally, with my issues:

(1-5 rating system where 1 is OMGWTFBBQSAUCE and 5 is stuff I'll never touch again as long as I live)

Nausea Relief: 4

Eye Itch: 5

Anxiety Relief: 4

Perkiness: 5

Asleepiness: 2

I just feel numb with itchy eyes and racing heartbeat and thoughts. No bueno. 

I don't like the way Jesus feels inside of me. Lmfao. Sorry, HAD to be said. Too little in life is that a legit statemen...”
“Effetto euforico graditissimo, sapore non male”
“this Aroma is really nice smelling calm down a little bit of a haze”
“Heavy onset but plateaus perfectly! Very nice. Super heavy hitter. Dont let the 14 percent fool you!”
“One of my very favorite!!!! Pain relieving and uplifting. But yet a good melt. If you sit too long you might not get up, LoL. Helps with my Insomnia”
“FUCK IM HI!”
“A very nice daytime strain, for when you have errands to run and need a quick pick-me-up with focus!”
“If you feel like dancing to music while in your room home alone, along with letting the sunlight shine through you like a hyper beam from a Venusaur, this is the strain for you.”
“Great Smoke! Definitely a higher grade strain”
“Really strong spacy sativa high, but also relaxes the body”
“the Lord hath cometh in this strain”
“Definitely a new favorite of mine. Great flavor  and high.”
“I'm not a religious man but if I were, I'd compare this to if you ground up Jesus and put him in some marijuana. Holy hell, was I wasted.”

“This is really good to smoke & run errands for sure, you get shxt done. I was able to still function without the stoner feel or look. The only Con is if you have bad anxiety, i wouldn't stay on this strain, made my anxiety go thru the roof when i first smoked it.”
“Jesus it was good LOL get it get it it's a joke Jesus it was good but it really was good so five stars”
“The best I ever had.”

“Probably one of the best strains I've smoked in concentrate form. mine was just called Jesus though. very good head high. very strong. I loved the tasted, very floral on exhale and also tasted really clean.”
“Exactly picture perfect of a sticky bud.”
“i love sativas and this is a very potent strain it lasts and  gave me an all-around calm feeling.”

“I got this from Michigan. This strain makes you feel very happy and Euphoric. If you don't want to get sleepy, use this. You will feel tingly after a hit or few and it simply feels great. It smells great, and looks great too.”

“I've had two phenos of this strain. One was nothing special, the other was a perfect example of what sour kush should be. Lemony, earthy, fuely, foxtailed buds that stink up whatever room they inhabit. Five star medicine without a doubt!”

“This strain is no joke. Very powerful, strong smoke. One small 'knife hit' hits hard. This lasts a long time and helps with stress and restlessness for me. Super stoned yet focused and keeps me motivated. Great strain 👍”

“Good strain, great for letting go of anxiety and relaxing my mind. I always felt like I could do better when I smoked this strain though.

Best taken with an edible if you ask me.”
“This is the most cerebral strain I have smoked in a LONG time. Focused, creative, stimulating are just some of the attributes of this amazing strain.”
“great strain, very clear high and nice taste”
“Great taste and mellow high. Good for day or night. Medium yield.”
“short high”

“JESUS!

I swear to gawd dawg. Jesus...

Picked up some from Siberie in Amsterdam. really nice smoke.”
“Just in time for the holidays.....  Very nice, calming& soothing. This ones on the would buy it again list”
“Got this a while back but it was great smoke when I had it”
“Not as harsh as its parent (hells angels) but you can feel it. Worth picking up”
“smokes clean.  not very tasty.  definitely gets the mind going.”

“I really enjoyed this strain! it made things pretty damn funny (highly recommend watching That 70's Show after smoking this strain) It makes me pretty happy and smiley, also it makes me want to move around lot, and its easy to get focused with too. and it tastes really good, like earthy lemon. It burns so smooth and its easy to take in which it always nice.”
“This is incredible medicine and rates as one of the best  strains I've experienced! Very pleasant, euphoric and makes you creative if you don't overdo it.”
“In the midst of the street of it
column4: and on either side of the river
column5: was there the tree of life
column6: which bare twelve manner of fruits
column7: and yielded her fruit every month: and the leaves of the tree were for the healing of the nations." Rev 22:2”"

column3: “The pain pt.who is a true conisseror!!!!!!!!!!”
“Harsh. Fairly hard to smoke. Good high, energetic”
“Heavy onset but plateaus perfectly! Very nice”
“this was fun. I had a slim joint and felt calm and relaxed quickly. no real side affects that are worth mentioning. calm and happy feeling overall”

“Very creative high, for me i had a really nice head high, and i was also found myself being paranoid. I found myself coming up with great ideas. So if your stuck on a project or something i would recommend this strain. Also very good taste.”
“pretty, strong and euphoric. Give a try if you come across it. Smoked 2 grams last night”
“Love it! I have a cartridge of this and hit it a time or two and clean house! Very uplifting, active, happy high.”

“I was looking for a very happy, fun, giggly experience.  I was in L'Eagle in Denver and they suggested I try this strain in a concentrate.  I will tell anybody that this strain is amazing.  I laugh so much and the world is very ok when I am flying on this.  Very impressed and it has become one of my favorites for life.”
“its a good strain, but I do find myself getting headaches after the come down”

“New patient, easily paranoid with strong strains......very mild tingles over whole body, smooth transition to and from....forgot about my pain and was able to enjoy two TV shows with full concentration. Good job.”

“Vaped The Jesus" from Fweedom. I am not sure if it is the same strain. This is labeled a 50/50. I am not sure there is anything noteworthy. A generic hybrid high. I will update again as I learn more.”"

“great for social anxiety!

I've had some incredible life changing moments with my savior, Jesus Christ while smoking this strain. deep intense conversations! mind blowing.”
“One of the first strains I got when I went to the club for they first time and gives you a very nice high. Engerized and just felt great all around. 10/10 would smoke again.”

“A sativa fan myself, this is an excellent psychoactive high that keeps my mind racing and curbs any anxiety (tending to be a bit lazy doesn't hurt that). This is a laid back high school feeling bake that is open to however you treat it- you could easily get slumped off this or be out and about. A happy sensation throughout!”
“bought an eighth a week ago, buds look golden! sticky icky, stoney green”
“Not a huge fan.  Smell wasn't great and it took a long time to hit. Required more maintenance to keep going than usual. Will try again later but wasn't impressed.”

“This bud did not help me sleep whatsoever. I have anxiety and have a tough time falling asleep some nights. I smoked this bud while out and I felt even more anxious, nervous, but at the same time I was acting totally calm. It was a weird combination of enjoying myself but also being on edge. Once I got home, took a few rips and I headed to bed. My mind was running like crazy. Thinking one thing after the next and the...”
“Holy crap! Been smoking 🚬 weed all day everyday for 31 years. This is a top 15 lifetime strain for me. Love ❤ it. Will enjoy every crumb I can get.”
“By the time I was done vaping this strain I was giggling hard for no particular reason. Strong head + body high. A very happy strain! Amazing citrus aroma and flavor.”
“great taste and not too over the top heady high. You can function and feel stoned at the same time. recommended for sure”

“Personally, I would rate this as a middle for me. Being a weird person that I am, I prefer certain strains for my moods. I wouldn't assume that I am the only one. This was definitely a typically sativa. I had this in pre-rolled form. Not to much of a body high, it was all in the dome". One of my favorite effects from Sativas was present. Watch something and stare at the images. Its like looking through a window as o...”"

“Makes me want to repent for my sins. 
A great chill with Jesus the OG”
“grew two sweet ladies from clones.  they were a dream to grow and smoke.  nice Orange peel scent. great for night time.”

“2/12 Stars
This is a review of the Dawg Star Cannabis version of this strain washington state i 502 recreational cannabis.  
1. Looks  9/10 lime green dense og nugs well packed with trichomes. 
2. Smell  4/10  Light fruity smell Stronger when ground up in a grinder.
3. Effects 9/10 Good uplifting energetic high.  More sativa then i usually like this was marked as a hybrid by dawg star.  But overall an enjoyable high
...”
“nice light high via vape. Good for afternoon use. Great sativa.”
“I know why they call it Jesus, one hit and that's what you are saying! Great Indica that has classic relaxing euphoric characteristics.  Would be great for pain or to help get to sleep.”
“This is one  great indica! It did wonders for my PTSD and insomnia. Plus I love the terpenes!”
“Amazingly perky, calm, yet ready. The perfect combination for anything. Love this strain! Merry Christmas”
“really clear minded high idk if I feel it in my body or head more though.it put me in a really good mood kinda gave me a headache at first  though”

“I'm in NYC we don't have medical stores out here that sell in bud form it's only pills and things of that nature but wen I got my hands on this I thought I was in heaven love the high, not a lazy high but an uplifting one. if you have not tried this one it's a must try”

“Great, uplifting, nice smelling flowers. Very relaxing but at the same time this strain does not make you sleepy. Highly recommended if you can get the real thing (unfortunately, some dispensaries just slap a big name on a crappy product) Careful, quite potent.”
“Definitely not top shelf. I ordered it because of the rating but wasn't impressed. No aftertaste or much euphoria”
“so anonymouse even tho i stated my my name several times. whatever”
“hello, I am nigerian, I am so dying to take this. I am sure it would take me away. I would not mind in anyway how I can get this”
“old door was gross.. no smell nothing. no high”
